camera.coffee.description: Save a snap of enabled cameras to the data folder every 10 minutes.
Delete old camera snaps twice a day.

fitbit.coffee.description: Get sleep data from Fitbit every day.

hue.coffee.description: Refresh Philips Hue hub data every minute.

netatmo.coffee.description: Get Netatmo device list twice a day.
Probe outdoor Netatmo conditions every 5 minutes.
Probe indoor Netatmo conditions every 5 minutes.

network.coffee.description: Probe network devices and update their statuses every minute.
Probe discoverable bluetooth devices every 5 minutes.

ninja.coffee.description: Probe Ninja Blocks device list every 20 minutes.

strava.coffee.description: Get Strava profile twice a day.
Get recent Strava activities list twice a day.

withings.coffee.description: Get recent body measures for the last month twice a day.

wunderground.coffee.description: Get updated weather information every 10 minutes.
Get updated weather forecast three times a day.
Get updated astronomy (sunrise, sunset, moon) twice a day.
